The main application of djangotailoring contains the basic feature set required to build a tailored web application. This includes tailoring2 Subject storage and composition, template tags to insert tailored content into Django templates, as well as generic views to encapsulate basic request handling. In addition, there are a few Django management commands and utilities that help in building parts of the djangotailoring project infrastructure.
